summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on August 20, 2019, and to produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena includes an attached rider detailing the recipient's rights and the scope of the requested materials.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.role: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena demands production of all materials relating to him, indicating he is the central subject of the grand jury investigation.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is issuing a subpoena to gather evidence for a grand jury investigation into Epstein.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The unnamed subpoena recipient is commanded to appear before the grand jury to testify and give evidence regarding alleged violations of federal law.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on August 15, 2019, for an appearance on August 20, 2019, indicating active federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein after his 2019 arrest.
The subpoena demands production of 'All materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein,' including text messages, emails, social media, documents, and notes, showing a broad evidence-gathering scope.
The alleged violations under investigation include 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (destruction/alteration of records in federal investigations).
The subpoena explicitly covers electronically stored material on computers, email accounts, iCloud, servers, and cellphones, including those in foreign jurisdictions.
The recipient of the subpoena is not named in the provided text, indicating it is a redacted or sample document.
